page.title: 05POST OFFFICE MOVE PROTEST
page.content: THE FIGHT TO STOP THE POST OFFICE MOVING 1453 NAMES WERE ON THE PETITION TO STOP THE POST OFFICE MOVING ,IT WAS COVERED WITH SIGNATURES COLLECTED BY THE AMENITY SOCIETY AND SENT TO THE HEAD POSTMASTER. THE SOCIETY STOOD OUTSIDE THE MAIN POST OFFICE. THE NEW POST OFFICE IS SITUATED IN ORCHARDSBUT TO SOME IT WILL CAUSE INCONVENIENCE. THERE ARE 2 SUB POST OFFICES THAT WILL HAVE TO CLOSE,ONE IN SUSSEX ROAD AND ONE IN THE BROADWAY. CHILDREN FROM HARLANDS SCHOOL INTERVIEWED RESIDENTS ABOUT THE CONTROVERSY .MANY WERE CONCERNED ABOUT THE FEE FOR THE CAR PARK AND SOME THE DANGEROUS WALK.
